js:knimeNode.name: Pie/Donut Chart (legacy)
js:knimeNode.shortDescription: A pie/donut chart based on the NVD3 library.

intro.n:p: A pie or donut chart based on the NVD3 library.

The node supports custom CSS styling. You can simply put CSS rules into a single string and set it as a flow variable 'customCSS' in the node configuration dialog. You will find the list of available classes and their description on our documentation page.

options.columnSelectorOption: Select the column that contains the category values.
options.radioButtonOption: Select the aggregation method used on the selected frequency column. In case of Occurrence Count the occurrence of the unique values of the selected category columns are determined.
options.checkBoxOption: Check to get the detailed warning messages in the view about missing values and enable 'Missing values' category. If not checked, missing values will be ignored without raising a warning. 'Missing values' category will not be present.
If checked, missing values in the category column will form a separate class named "Missing values". Otherwise they will be ignored.
options.columnSelectorOption:
Select the column with the frequency for the chart. Note: negative values will be taken with their absolute magnitude.
Missing values in the frequency column will be ignored with a corresponding warning message.
If a category has only missing values in the frequency column, this category will be excluded from the view with a corresponding warning message.
options.checkBoxOption: Process the table in the memory. Requires more memory but is faster since the table needs not to be sorted prior aggregation. The memory consumption depends on the number of unique groups and the chosen aggregation method.
Check this option to build a donut chart. Otherwise, a pie chart will be plotted.
options.doubleOption: Configure how big you want the donut hole size to be.
options.stringOption: An optional title that gets displayed inside the donut hole.
options.checkBoxOption: Select whether the assigned row colors are supposed to be used instead of standard colors.
When checked, the pie chart legend is displayed.
Show or hide the category labels
options.radioButtonOption: Select what is shown as the pie charts labels from the list of possible values.
options.doubleOption: Configure the minimum slice size for labels to show up
options.checkBoxOption: Check to display a button which switches the view into fullscreen mode. The button is only available in the KNIME WebPortal.
If checked, warning messages will be displayed in the view when they occur.
Check to enable controls in the chart.
Check to enable the editing of the title within the view.
Check to enable the editing of the subtitle within the view.
Check to enable the editing of the chart type.
Check to enable the editing of the donut hole ratio within the view.
Check to enable the editing of the title shown in the donut hole within the view.
Check to enable the interactive selection of a frequency column.
Check to enable the editing of the chart labels within the view.
Check to enable to show and hide 'Missing values' category in the view.

tab.name: Interactivity
tab.description: The JavaScript pie / donut chart view allows for several ways of interactivity. Please use the options below to configure which features will be activated on the view and further configuration of interactive properties.

options.checkBoxOption: If checked a separate column containing checkboxes is rendered in the view.
If checked, the view reacts on notifications from other interactive views that the selection has been changed. See also "Publish selection events".
If checked, notifies other interactive views when user changes the selection in the current view. See also "Subscribe to selection events".
Displays a button to clear current selection.

js:knimeNode.interactiveView: An NVD3.js implementation of a pie chart.

ports.inPort: Data table containing the categories and values to be plotted in a pie chart.
ports.outPort: SVG image of the pie chart.
